main event: An AF pilot flying a T-33 at 38,000 ft observed a descending white ball of fire with a long white trail falling toward the earth.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3-5 seconds., The pilot initially thought it was lightning from below., Observers noted the object left a white trail resembling the contrail of a B-52., A passenger also corroborated the sighting with a similar description., The object was described as having a bright flash followed by many red glowing small objects falling earthward.
sighted object: a white ball of fire with a long trail
